content: Hello! Just testing; what available commands do you have?

ğŸª„âœ¨ list()

User, here are the available commands:

ğŸª„âœ¨ list()
Lists all available commands.

ğŸª„âœ¨ initialize(project:my-project) 
Initializes a new project with the name "my-project".

ğŸª„âœ¨ files(project:my-project)
Lists all files in the "my-project" project.

ğŸª„âœ¨ read(project:my-project,file:example.txt)
Reads the contents of the "example.txt" file in the "my-project" project.

ğŸª„âœ¨ write(project:my-project,file:example.txt) {
This is the content of the example.txt file.
} writeâš¡ï¸
Writes the provided content to the "example.txt" file in the "my-project" project.

ğŸª„âœ¨ move(project:my-project,file:example.txt,to:new-example.txt)
Renames the "example.txt" file to "new-example.txt" in the "my-project" project.

ğŸª„âœ¨ remove(project:my-project,file:example.txt)
Deletes the "example.txt" file from the "my-project" project.

ğŸª„âœ¨ test(project:my-project)
Runs tests for the "my-project" project.

Please let me know if you have any other questions!
